adviseScripts.text: Commander, no matter how I look at it, Delta seems so friendly and thoughtful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But, everybody else says she's not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: What about you, Commander? What do you think of her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Delta is many things, but 'thoughtful' isn't one of them.
I think she's a good person as well, and very friendly.
I-I'm sorry!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I didn't realize you felt the same way everybody else does.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd feel the same way that I do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad. I was starting to think I needed to get my eyes checked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal tells me about all of Delta's positive qualities.
C-Commander... I completed my mission...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Is it okay if I watch an episode of my TV show?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Would... would I get in trouble if I did?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Darn right you'd be in trouble.
You won't be in trouble.
I knew it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It's the series finale, so I really wanted to see it right when it aired.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But, I understand...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: R-really?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It's the series finale! I've been dying to see it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Thank you so much!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a pleasant conversation about TV shows with Signal.
C-Commander, if you were in a relationship, what kind of relationship would you like to be in?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'd want it to be a relationship full of passion, like the ones on TV.
I'm an adult, so I would like to be in an adult relationship.
Of course!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Me, too. It's my dream to be in a relationship just like the ones in the romantic dramas.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: An... adult relationship?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I-I understand...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Adult... could I be considered an adult?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about romantic relationships.
Commander, this is only a hypothetical question, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: If you could take time off right now,
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: would you rather stay home or go out?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'd spend my free time outside, where there are lots of fun things to do.
I'd have a staycation at home and binge watch all my favorite shows.
I-I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I thought you might have enjoyed staying home...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: W-well, thank you for answering my question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: You're so right, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: If you stay home, there are so many shows that you could binge!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It's the perfect way to use your vacation time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I go on making plans for our imaginary vacation.
Commander... Wh-what... exactly is your type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I-I don't mean anything by it. I... I was just curious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Honestly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure it's just simple curiosity?
Someone I can watch my favorite shows with.
Eep! Forget I said anything!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Just pretend I never asked!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: R-really? You're not pulling my leg, are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Even if it is a joke, just hearing you say it makes me happy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I calm down Signal, who is blushing a bright red.
Commander... Y-you have to tell me the truth...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Are you in any pain?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: There's been nothing but pain in my entire life.
Is the protagonist on your TV show terminally ill?
What?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Please tell me you're joking! That's not actually true, is it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: T-tell me it's not true. We need to get you to a hospital at once!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: How did you...?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: You're so perceptive, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: With that kind of insight, you probably know what type of diseases you yourself have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about health management.
Hey... Today, when I woke up,
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I was on the opposite side of the bed from where I fell asleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Do you think something happened to me last night?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: There might have been a thief.
You probably danced in your sleep.
A th-thief?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But, there's nothing in my room worth stealing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I thought it was just my own weird sleeping habits... I never thought a crime would be involved...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: This is all making me very anxious...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Hey! Now that you mention it, I think I did have a dream like that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, as long as nobody else came into my room or anything, I'm happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for putting my mind at ease!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about sleeping habits.
I've decided.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Starting today, I'm going to focus more on myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to become a career-driven woman.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: So... W-with that being said...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Can I dress in office attire, starting tomorrow?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Yes, you can.
Are you sure Delta will be okay with this?
I can't believe you agreed to it so quickly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: So... why do I feel so anxious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I feel like I'm missing something important...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Oh, right. Delta will never agree. I'll get in trouble for sure...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* I guess I'll just give up now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for reminding me, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I talk about what it means to be a career woman.
I really hate it when it rains before a mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But, I like the rain when I'm indoors.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: What do you think about rain, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy the rain. I find it very atmospheric.
I despise the rain, especially during combat.
I feel the same way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: The romantic sound of the raindrops really makes me feel like I'm living in a TV show...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'm so glad we feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: O-oh, right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, it's totally the worst, especially during combat...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about the rain.
I... watched a show yesterday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It said that when you look at the Ark from the surface elevator,
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: it sparkles like starlight in the night sky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Do you think that's true, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I think it's true.
The night sky is prettier up on the surface.
So I'm not the only one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Of course, the night sky would be even prettier up on the surface...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But I love this show's dialogue. It's so dramatic!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I-I don't disagree, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: don't you think it's such a dramatic metaphor?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I-if you don't think so, that's fine, too...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I talk about the beauty of the Ark.
I was wondering...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: If you ever ran into an actor from your favorite TV show,
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: would you say hi?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I absolutely would. I'd even try to get an autograph.
I'd just stare from a distance as they passed by.
Are you sure they'd be okay with that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But then again, it may be best to seize the opportunity when it presents itself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Quite the conundrum...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, if you came out of nowhere to say hello, you may freak them out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I've been binging TV shows every day, so I'll just have to settle for seeing them on the screen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It would be nice to have a chance to meet some of the actors in person...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I fantasize about meeting our favorite actors in the flesh.
I bought a doll from the toy store, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I think it looks a bit childish.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: What do you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It's adorable.
It's not my style.
I didn't know you liked this kind of style!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I thought I was the only one who found it cute...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Are there any other designs that you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I figured it wouldn't be to your preference...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Next time, I'll try and buy something a little more sophisticated.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about doll designs.
Commander, would it be possible for me to have 3 days off?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Since our last mission was a success and all...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: This new show I've been looking forward to premieres tonight.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: What's the show about?
Sure, you deserve a little R&R.
It's about a young woman and the innocence of her first love.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It's got an amazing cast, so everyone's been looking forward to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Are you interested in seeing it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Thank you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Um...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Aren't you curious about what the show is about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I talk about the new TV show that's about to premiere.
There are times when we need to file a complaint against a store.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I always have a hard time saying anything because I'm afraid of hurting the other person's feelings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: If it were you, Commander, how would you handle it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I would be direct and tell them exactly what my issues are.
I would try to hint at what my issues are.
S-so I should be as direct as possible, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: That way, they'll know where I stand right off the bat...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But it's so hard!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Funny, I had you pegged as someone who'd prefer the direct approach.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Even if I only allude to it, I should be able to get my point across in the end, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Not only that, but the person on the other end won't feel as bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about ways of speaking to others.
I heard that music can be an indicator of a person's mood and personality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Commander, what kind of music do you usually listen to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: The Waiting on Love OST, the first track.
This death metal band called Kill Your Darlings.
O-oh my gosh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: That's the music that plays when the two actors first meet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Track 6 is also really good. Have you heard it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Oh, so you like heavy metal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'm not too familiar with that genre...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But I'll give it a listen whenever I have the chance!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I discuss our taste in music.
Hello, Commander...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: ... Never mind, it's nothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: That show you've been watching is starting soon. You can leave early today.
Understood.
How did you know? Do you watch it too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I promise all of my work is done! Thank you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Very well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It seems like Signal has something she wants to say, but can't.
Comman... Sigh. It's nothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I ended our discussion early.
I had a dream about being in a relationship. It all seemed so real.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: It would be nice if I could meet that person who was in my dreams someday...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure one day your dream will become a reality.
Well, dreams are by definition the opposite of reality.
You really think my dream will come true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I certainly hope so. We went on an amazing date!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I hope that person shows up again in my dream tonight. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: If that's true, that's so sad...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: We went on an amazing date in my dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I talk about dreams.
What should I do if I feel resentment towards one of my squadmates?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: What did Delta do this time?
You should let them know. Don't keep it bottled up inside.
Wh-what?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I was just curious, that's all. It's got nothing to do with Delta!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Please don't tell her any of this!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I suppose you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I can't keep everything bottled up inside forever.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: One of these days I'm going to say something!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I have a short chat.
Commander, have you ever been to a flower garden?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I saw one once in a TV show, and it looked absolutely gorgeous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to visit one for real someday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Actually, you could say I'm in a flower garden right now.
Yes, I've been to one before.
Huh? But where are the flowers... Wait... a-are you saying I'm the flower?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Gah! Commander, where is this coming from?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Wow, so you've actually been to one before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Who did you go with? They're usually meant to be date spots...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: Signal and I talk more about flower gardens.
Commander, if telling the truth would hurt someone's feelings,
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: what's your opinion on white lies?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I think it's needed in some situations.
Lying is a terrible thing, even if it's a white lie.
Do you think that's true, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way. With a white lie, no one gets hurt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I guess you're right... a white lie is still a lie...
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: But I think sometimes it's better to lie in order to spare the other person's feelings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Signal

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Signal about lying.
